Curriculum Vitae

The Lattes Database is a Curriculum and institutions database of Science and Technology areas in Brazil.
You can see my Lattes CV in Portuguese or in English.
ORCiD provides you with an unique digital identifier and also connects with all major publishers and funding agencies. Hopefully this will became the de-facto online CV for all researchers in the world.
My ORCiD is 0000-0001-5073-5572  
 

Quick bio

  • 2015-?? - Associate Professor of Geotechnologies
    Institute of Energy and Environment (IEE-USP) - Brazil.
  • 2015 - Habilitation Thesis (Livre Docência)
    Institute of Geosciences - University of São Paulo (IGc-USP) - Brazil.
  • 2014-2015 - Assistant Professor of Geotechnologies
    Institute of Energy and Environment (IEE-USP) - Brazil.
  • 2009-2014 - Assistant Professor of Geotechnologies
    Institute of Geosciences - University of São Paulo (IGc-USP) - Brazil.
  • 2004-2008 - Doctor of Sciences Degree (PhD equivalent - Geotectonics) IGc-USP - Brazil.
    Thesis available at the University of São Paulo Digital Library.
  • 2002-2004 - Master of Sciences Degree (MSc equivalent - Geotectonics) IGc-USP - Brazil.
    Thesis available at the University of São Paulo Digital Library.
  • 1996-2001 - Geology Degree (BSc Hons. equivalent) IGc-USP - Brazil.
  • 1977 - Origin of species
